text: Aahoo Jahansouz "Sarah" Shahi (; born January 10, 1980) is an American television actress and former NFL Cheerleader. She played Kate Reed in the USA Network legal drama Fairly Legal in 2011â€“12, Carmen on The L Word in 2008, and also starred as Sameen Shaw on the CBS crime drama Person of Interest. Shahi has also appeared as the main female role Det. Dani Reese in Life, and in a supporting role in Alias. She will play the superhero Isis in the DC Extended Universe movie Black Adam (2022). ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Models from Texas Category:Actors from Texas
title: Sarah Shahi
